MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the WA9 postcode area of St Helens, affecting properties in Gloucester Street, Ramford Street, Smithfield Street and surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 11:29AM. Our engineers have arrived on site and are investigating the cause of the fault. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2:30PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12:37PM on 7th February 2021.
